attributes.action: make it against the law to sell energy drinks to under the age of 18
attributes.additional_details: These energy drinks should not be consumed by a child the health implications could be life threatening
attributes.background: More and more I'm seeing children purchasing energy drinks.this is unbelievable as it can only take one energy drink to kill a child with a undignified heart condition allso high levels of caffeine and sugar that will lead to health issues.this has to stop
